title: [Large-Scale] Language Education Design Utilizing Game-Centered Learning (GCL) Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Flexible game design reflecting learners' experiences and creativity, with consideration of cultural backgrounds

learning_goals: Learners can use daily conversational expressions of the target language with over 80% accuracy through game-based activities.
Learners enhance creative problem-solving skills by designing and implementing collaborative language games.
Learners develop and share self-directed language learning games three or more times using digital platforms.

resources: Game Templates for Language Learning Resources

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
